oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Return receipt for a Grand Army of the Republic application
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A return receipt from the United States Post Office from Jamestown, Tennessee dated 1893. The sender was Joel Lindsey Reagan who applied for membership in the Grand Army of the Republic. Applicant was from Little Crab, Fentress County, Tenn. Reagan served in Co. D, 1st Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA. Died November 24, 1920. The regiment was recruited among loyal Middle Tennesseans and spent much of the war trying to clear out Confederate guerrillas in Middle Tennessee and the Cumberland Plateau.
